descriptionHTML:
This is an alternative app for controlling your Logitech Harmony™ Hub.
I created this app because i did not like the looks and the responsiveness of the official app. Also i would like to add extra features.

* Auto detects your hub(s).
* Support for multiple hubs
* Fast
* Clean

This is the first version of the app. Feedback is really appreciated. Future versions will include:
* Android Wear support. Control A/V devices from your wrist.
* Tasker support. Create tasker tasks and profiles to control your devices.
Harmony is either a registered trademark or trademark of Logitech in the United States and/or other countries. All other trademarks are the property of their respective owners.
comments: So far so good This looks promising. Is development still ongoing? Would like to see tasker integration!
Dead project? Almost a year since the last update,  no tasker support as yet.
Great App I can't wait for Wear integration!
So much better than the stock

Best Harmony remote Unlike the original Harmony app from Logitech, this app is clean, fast and does exactly what it should do. I was expecting ads as the app is free, but no ads! Can't wait for Android Wear support, keep up the good work!
Great start It will need some improvements, eg. some buttons missing, devices screen etc. Overall it is very promising. Can't wait for Tasker integration!
recentChanges: - Possible fix for not working 'back' button
